raw_comment: It is very interesting how Indonesia is the top in the graph and this could maybe be because of the newfound stability the country has had, likewise Brazil is very low and has unrest and very high crime rates. I think it also very interesting as to why the 25-39 year old generation has been left out.
ace_sentences: Indonesia is at the top of the graph.
This stability could explain why Indonesia is at the top of the graph.
Brazil is very low in the graph.
Brazil has very high crime rates.
This unrest and these crime rates could explain why Brazil is very low in the graph.
The 25-39 year old generation has been left out.
I want to know why the 25-39 year old generation has been left out.
